prompt.content: By how much did DUOL's deferred revenue attributable to subscriptions increase during 2024? Express your answer in $ millions rounded to one decimal.

messages.content: [{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Identify the deferred revenue attributable to subscriptions formula as Formula: 2024 Subscription Bookings - 2024 Subscription Revenue"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Find Subscription bookings from item 7 = $730.737 million"},{"criteria":"Find Subscription revenue from item 7 = $607.531 million","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Calculate the difference = $123.206 million (730.737 âˆ’ 607.531)"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Rounded the difference to one decimal place = $123.2 million (Final Answer: $123.2 million)"}]
